content: celebrate the passing of time with the months of the year blanket this beautiful year-long cal 2025 features 12 unique panels each representing a different month of the year the pattern uses the overlay mosaic crochet technique regardless of your skill level the detailed written instructions clear charts and handy video tutorials will guide you every step of the way key features - 12 unique panels one for each month - overlay mosaic crochet - paid ebook 1 or free monthly charts 2 - adaptable size - beginner-friendly instructions and tutorials - large print option - a supportive community to keep you motivated throughout the year start your crochet journey today and enjoy the satisfaction of creating something beautiful one month at a time ***please note that the yardage is based on a five-repeat wide blanket *** you may sell the blankets that you crochet by following this pattern on a small scale provided that you credit elimee designs as the pattern designer mass production is not permitted this pattern or any of its parts may not be altered reproduced distributed sold made into a video tutorial or translated without written permission from elimee designs copies can be made for personal use only please note that all pdf crochet patterns by elimee designs are non-refundable this pattern is only available in english if you would like any support whilst crocheting this pattern or to give us any feedback please contact me here or post in the elimee designs crochet pattern group on facebook 3 sign-up to receive my weekly newsletter 4 where you ll receive freebies hear about giveaways/sales and be the first to know about new pattern launches for all safety notices and gpsr contact details please visit the blog post linked below this pdf if free from viruses malware and a risk assessment has been carried out 1 https //payhip com/b/ukh4g/af653cc56adc30c 2 https //www elimeedesigns co uk/blog/months-of-the-year-blanket-crochet-along-crochet-pattern 3 https //www facebook com/groups/575696026789853 4 https //dashboard mailerlite com/forms/183962/69245113411307155/share
